body:
Comment 2: 
At the least it sounds like debugedit has the bug, and not our tools.
Readelf output below. As far as I can see the .debug_gdb_script sections i fine. The
alignment is 1, so it's definitely aligned properly.

$ readelf -S go.bad
There are 33 section headers, starting at offset 0x134:

Section Headers:
  [Nr] Name              Type            Addr     Off    Size   ES Flg Lk Inf Al
  [ 0]                   NULL            00000000 000000 000000 00      0   0  0
  [ 1] .text             PROGBITS        08048c00 000c00 1cd282 00  AX  0   0 16
  [ 2] .rodata           PROGBITS        08215ea0 1cdea0 134f60 00   A  0   0 32
  [ 3] .typelink         PROGBITS        0834ae00 302e00 0007d4 00   A  0   0  4
  [ 4] .gosymtab         PROGBITS        0834b5e0 3035e0 114f27 00   A  0   0 32
  [ 5] .gopclntab        PROGBITS        08460520 418520 01bff6 00   A  0   0 32
  [ 6] .rel              REL             0847c518 434518 000008 08   A 13   0  4
  [ 7] .gnu.version      VERSYM          0847c520 434520 00002c 02   A 13   0  2
  [ 8] .gnu.version_r    VERNEED         0847c560 434560 000060 00   A 12   2  4
  [ 9] .hash             HASH            0847c5c0 4345c0 000078 04   A 13   0  4
  [10] .rel.plt          REL             0847c640 434640 000088 08   A 13   0  0
  [11] .plt              PROGBITS        0847c6e0 4346e0 000120 04  AX  0   0  4
  [12] .dynstr           STRTAB          0847c800 434800 000157 00   A  0   0  1
  [13] .dynsym           DYNSYM          0847c960 434960 000160 10   A 12   0  4
  [14] .shstrtab         STRTAB          00000000 434ac0 00018c 00      0   0  1
  [15] .got              PROGBITS        0847d000 435000 000004 04  WA  0   0  4
  [16] .got.plt          PROGBITS        0847d020 435020 000050 04  WA  0   0  4
  [17] .dynamic          DYNAMIC         0847d080 435080 000098 08  WA 12   0  4
  [18] .noptrdata        PROGBITS        0847d120 435120 010b80 00  WA  0   0 32
  [19] .data             PROGBITS        0848dca0 445ca0 007920 00  WA  0   0 32
  [20] .bss              NOBITS          084955c0 44d5c0 0057c0 00  WA  0   0 32
  [21] .noptrbss         NOBITS          0849ad80 452d80 005380 00  WA  0   0 32
  [22] .interp           PROGBITS        08048bed 000bed 000013 00   A  0   0  1
  [23] .symtab           SYMTAB          00000000 44e000 021cb0 10     24 274  4
  [24] .strtab           STRTAB          00000000 46fcb0 034f00 00      0   0  1
  [25] .debug_abbrev     PROGBITS        00000000 4a4bb0 0000cc 00      0   0  1
  [26] .debug_line       PROGBITS        00000000 4a4c7c 02d18f 00      0   0  1
  [27] .debug_frame      PROGBITS        00000000 4d1e0b 02aa14 00      0   0  1
  [28] .debug_info       PROGBITS        00000000 4fc81f 0b579b 00      0   0  1
  [29] .debug_pubnames   PROGBITS        00000000 5b1fba 03d091 00      0   0  1
  [30] .debug_pubtypes   PROGBITS        00000000 5ef04b 011b9b 00      0   0  1
  [31] .debug_aranges    PROGBITS        00000000 600be6 000e1c 00      0   0  1
  [32] .debug_gdb_script PROGBITS        00000000 601a02 00002c 00      0   0  1
Key to Flags:
  W (write), A (alloc), X (execute), M (merge), S (strings)
  I (info), L (link order), G (group), T (TLS), E (exclude), x (unknown)
  O (extra OS processing required) o (OS specific), p (processor specific)
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
